General.Name: Dongnam Chem
General.Description: Dongnam Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemicals and surfactants in South Korea. It offers nonionic, cationic, anionic, and amphoteric surfactants. The company was formerly known as Dongnam Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dongnam Chemical Co., Ltd. in March 2004. Dongnam Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is based in Gongju, South Korea.
